Summary



Reliance Capital in focus as subsidiary Reliance Home lists todayKNR Construction JV bags order worth Rs 884.47 crore from Telangana governmentA2Z Infra makes one-time settlement with banks as part of the corporate debt restructuring agreementBharti Airtel gets shareholders nod for merger of Telenor with companyInterGlobe Aviation approves allotment of 3.35 crore shares pursuant to QIP






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India fell 0.55 percent to 10,085 as of 7:30 am





Your guide to today's trade.https://t.co/piDdhTARx8— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) September 22, 2017






Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: InterGlobe Aviation, KNR Construction, Reliance Capital
